channel.title: Connection Error - Trying Again in 5...4....3....2..1.......10
channel.description: Ok, I got a new source that was actually simple enough for me (I'm a new coder and I want to get used to stuff instead of being confused going through bin files and stuff like that. Well, I changed the IP and it actually worked. It says it's online. I am not sure if this is an anti-leech, but when I download the client from a different computer and click run, it goes "Connection Error - Trying Again in 5...4....3....2..1.......10.........." an increased by 5 everytime. I do not know what this is. Does anybody else know? :confused:

item.title: Connection Error - Trying Again in 5...4....3....2..1.......10
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

I’m pretty sure I portforwarded right. My computer guy actually came over and did it for me.
It worked fine before :mad:
Modem:

Bellsouth.jpg1022×766

Router:
netgear.jpg1024×768

Read full topic

item.title: Connection Error - Trying Again in 5...4....3....2..1.......10
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

That is a client side error and is to do with either the background image, sprite or cache.
I would try using a new client if you are somewhat inexperienced, as it would save time.

Read full topic

item.title: Connection Error - Trying Again in 5...4....3....2..1.......10
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

solution 1: did yu change ip when yu downloaded it on another computer?

solution 2: is the cache file in the c:/ file (think all cache files need to go here)

solution 3: get another client (yu can use mine if yu need 2, i am currently working on a 508)

solution 4: ask creator of client (if yu didn’t make it)

Read full topic

item.title: Connection Error - Trying Again in 5...4....3....2..1.......10
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

Ok, I got a new source that was actually simple enough for me (I’m a new coder and I want to get used to stuff instead of being confused going through bin files and stuff like that. Well, I changed the IP and it actually worked. It says it’s online. I am not sure if this is an anti-leech, but when I download the client from a different computer and click run, it goes “Connection Error - Trying Again in 5…4…3…2…1…10…” an increased by 5 everytime. I do not know what this is. Does anybody else know?

Read full topic
